price: 32. Tolkaygow! Waxaan anigu idiinka cabsan Maalinta isu Yeeridda7.
arabic: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلتَّنَادِ
footnotes: 7. Waa maalinta Qiyaamaha, markay denbiilayaasha la qeylin argarax, dadku waa isu yeeran goobta Qiyaamaha iyagoo in loo shafeeco raba.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wayāqawmi innī akhāfu ʿalaykum yawma al-tanādi
